comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110828 Firefox/9.0a1
Build ID: 20110828030757

Steps to reproduce:

Opened a website:
http://radikalfx.com/files/anibg/


Actual results:

the canvas appeared and acted normally, but when I dragged another FF window over that one, the animation became jerky and sped up extremely.


Expected results:

The animation speed to remain constant.
